oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cpl. Edward Wiseman's saber
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Model 1840 Dragoon (heavy cavalry) saber belonging to Cpl. Edward Wiseman, Co. C, 2nd Wisconsin Cav. Regt., USA. The blade is imported with Marshal mark on right ricasso. It was probably made in Germany.; The saber was most likely a private purchase rather than military issue. The 2nd Wisconsin Cavalry was in the siege of Vicksburg and the siege of Jackson, Mississippi.
